questions.text: Which age group makes you light up the most?
Do you want to keep it simple, or mix it up?
questions.subtitle: Double degrees take 4 years too ‚Äî same time, extra options.

options.label: üí™ Yep, Health & PE is my jam

questions.text: How important is inclusion to you?

options.label: üíñ Super important ‚Äî make it my focus

outcomes.title: Early Childhood & Primary Education
outcomes.blurb: Play-based learning, creativity and helping kids grow in every way.

outcomes.title: Primary Education ‚Äî Double Degree
outcomes.blurb: Primary + a second passion (Arts/Business/Fine Art/Music/Science). Same 4 years, bigger toolkit.

outcomes.title: Bachelor of Primary Education
outcomes.blurb: Teach across all key primary subjects, with loads of classroom practice.

outcomes.title: Primary & Secondary Health + PE
outcomes.blurb: Wellbeing, coaching and movement ‚Äî teach HPE across year levels.

outcomes.title: Primary & Secondary Inclusive & Special Education
outcomes.blurb: Champion inclusion and support diverse learners across ages 5‚Äì18.

outcomes.title: Primary & Secondary Education
outcomes.blurb: Teach across stages of development and specialise at secondary.

outcomes.title: Secondary Ed (Hons) + Arts
outcomes.blurb: Two teaching areas from languages, humanities, media, psychology and more.

outcomes.title: Secondary Ed (Hons) + Business
outcomes.blurb: Teach accounting, business management, economics or legal studies.

outcomes.title: Secondary Ed (Hons) + Music
outcomes.blurb: Specialise in music education ‚Äî performance, pedagogy and curriculum.

outcomes.title: Secondary Ed (Hons) + Science
outcomes.blurb: Choose from maths, biology, chemistry, physics, psychology or digital technologies.

outcomes.title: Secondary Ed (Hons) + Fine Art
outcomes.blurb: Specialise in visual arts with a double degree format.

outcomes.title: Secondary Health & Physical Education
outcomes.blurb: Become a specialist HPE teacher and add a third area such as business or maths.
